title: Dynamic Queue Freezing.
body: If this happens to you make sure you send a ticket to Riot to make sure that ranked game does not count as a loss. Dw i feel ur pain as i am unable to reconnect to the game and play a blind pick match instead, but I am sure riot are working on the problem ( As NA and EUW Dynamic queues are down) and hopefully it should be fixed soon. {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Also for the people out there who dont know how to submit a ticket, go to this site: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us then click 'Get Help' and follow the prompts.
